-Kit-

Also looks at the sun, and grins. "Guess we should" Without she puts her scanners on and searches for something like a cave, or a hollow tree. 

But then again she didn't think a unicorn would be able to fit in a hollow tree like her. A cave it was then.

"Here!!! Found a cave!!" She yells to Pegasus half a minute later. It was fairly big, but with a smaller entrance so it wasn't as exposed to the outside. It was nice and warm inside.. insulated. Kit thanks her good luck. "Whoo!"

------Original Message------
From: "Joseph Frey" <jfrey1@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 20, 2000 6:09:14 PM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


Pegasus stared at the setting sun.  "I guess we should find someplace to
stay for the night," he said.  "There are natural predators out here that
would love to take advantage of meat like us."
----- Original Message -----
From: Teltoli SilverFlight <teltoli@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 18, 2000 10:24 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> -Kit-
>
> "I have a feeling you're not telling me everything. But just because I'm
kind I'll let it drop" *She says thoughtfully*
>
> *She sighs and looks down at the ground as she walks along. The sun seemed
to sink rapidly, till it was just above the brink of the horizon. The fading
rays cast an array of colours across the sky*
>
> "Aaahh.. my favourite time of night" *She grins, her fur turned orange by
the light* "Best time for fishing as well!"
